Html:
Hi,
after unzip the downloaded file, I try to open the rwar.exe but an error window appear (my xp is in Italian so I try to traslate):
Rawr.exe - Application error
Application not correctly initialized (oxc0000135). Click Ok to close the application
Some Ideas
Thanks
You need to install the .NET Framework from Microsoft. There's a download link in the readme.

Thank you very much
Marco
